import React from 'react' import laptop from '../../assets/Laptop.png' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' const Banner = () => { const { i18n,t } = useTranslation(); return(

{t('banner_start_title')}

{t('banner_main_title')}

{t("banner_end_title")}

{t('banner_desc')}

) } export default Banner
